article: the kurdish democratic party -lrb- kdp -rrb- , a main kurdish party based in northern iraq , has said that kurds oppose any kind of compromise over kirkuk , iraq 's northern oil-rich city , the turkish daily hurriyet reported on friday .
abstract: kurdish party leader vows no concession on kirkuk
